paper_abstract: We consider uniformly continuous functions on a Baire space and introduce the notion of a continuity modulus of a function. We formulate a condition on the growth of the continuity modulus phi guaranteeing that superpositions of n-ary functions with continuity modulus phi do not exhaust all (n + 1)-ary functions with continuity modulus phi for any n. Moreover, negating this property leads to the inverse effect.
paper_title: Superpositions of continuous functions defined on a Baire space
